tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE annotated_text_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    text_data TEXT NOT NULL,
    entity_type TEXT NOT NULL,
    start_offset INTEGER NOT NULL,
    end_offset INTEGER NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE training_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    text_id INT,
    named_entity_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (text_id) REFERENCES named_entities(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (named_entity_id) REFERENCES named_entities(id)
);

CREATE TABLE model_evaluations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    precision FLOAT,
    recall FLOAT,
    f1_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE training_data (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    document_id UUID NOT NULL,
    model_id UUID NOT NULL,
    start_index INT NOT NULL,
    end_index INT NOT NULL,
    entity_type TEXT NOT NULL
);
